import React, { useContext } from 'react'; import { AppointmentContext } from './Context/AppointmentContext'; function AppointmentForm() { const { selectedSessionName, date, score, time, type, feedback, setFeedback, setScore, } = useContext(AppointmentContext); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); }; return (
Register Form
Date: {date} | Time: {time}
setScore(e.target.value)} />
setFeedback(e.target.value)} />
); } export default AppointmentForm;
